name: The Mystery of Wisp Island
description:
WELCOME TO WISP ISLAND

Wisp Island, a location abandoned recently for unknown reasons. You play as Ash Maves, an investigator on his biggest mystery yet. What happened to all the residents? What kind of secrets does Wisp Island contain? Solve puzzles and discover the mystery behind this strange location.

FEATURES

VR Compatible (Headset only. Requires keyboard and mouse to control)

Gamepad Support

Interesting Puzzles

Dungeon Delving

Engaging Mysteries

Atmospheric Overworld

Beautiful Landscapes
